title: When will the Human race possess the necessary technology to travel to another Earth-like planet? - Quora

response.answer_text: Quite possibly never. We know there aren't any in our solar system and the nearest other system is light years away. We know that we weaken rapidly in low gravity, so we'd need to generate an artificial field. That alone would require a quite large vessel. Then there's the issue of propulsion. And the issue of radiation. And the issue of food! If you can't grow it, you have to take it with you. Oh, and water.
